meta package and partly a control/configurationpackage for the DCOR extensions in CKAN.Installation------------See the`official instructions<https://dc.readthedocs.io/en/latest/sec_self_hosting/installation.html#dcor-extensions>`_for more information.Testing-------:: vagrant plugin install vagrant-vbguest vagrant up vagrant
